solution_line_template: {total_people} people - {checkered_shirts} people = <<{total_people}-{checkered_shirts}={people_wearing_stripes}>>{people_wearing_stripes} people are wearing stripes.

The number of people wearing horizontal stripes is {multiplier_horizontal_checkered} horizontal stripes/checkered shirt x {checkered_shirts} checkered shirts = <<{multiplier_horizontal_checkered}*{checkered_shirts}={horizontal_stripes}>>{horizontal_stripes} horizontal stripes

The number of people wearing vertical stripes is {people_wearing_stripes} total stripes - {horizontal_stripes} horizontal stripes = <<{people_wearing_stripes}-{horizontal_stripes}={vertical_stripes}>>{vertical_stripes} vertical stripes
